fields.name: issue-template
fields.content:
When did you notice the problem?

What can you do to reproduce it?
1. 
2. 
3. 

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

When can we contact you if we need further information? When is it convenient to try to fix the problem?

fields.name: help-create-issue
fields.content:
Registering an issue

  • Enter your name and email address. Also write your phone number that we can reach you through if we would need additional information.
  • Select the project that this issue concerns.
  • Decide whether the issue is urgent or not. Avoid marking issues as urgent if they do not need absolutely immediate attention. Over-use can make it more difficult for us to provide good service. Thanks for your cooperation!
  • Enter a short and succinct issue summary.
  • Try to write an as detailed as possible description. It can seem unnecessary but it will help us to learn about your project and give better service in the long run. Use the guidelines that the field is pre-filled in with.
  • Double check that you've entered enough relevant information for us to be able to solve your issue and then click send.

fields.name: help-list-issues
fields.content:
Select the project you would like information on and click OK. A summary of the open issues are now shown. If you would want more information on a given issue, there's a direct link to the Mantis issue for your convenience.

Observe that issues moved out from service desk to regular operations or projects are not shown in the list.
